dalersmootha3.name: Daler Rowney Smooth Heavyweight A3
dalersmootha3.description: A3 (297 × 420 mm) smooth cartridge; cellulose, sized
dalersmootha3.notes: Neutral stock with low-medium absorbency. Micron inks stay razor sharp; acrylic dries fast on the surface and may leave a neat ridge. Excellent everyday sheet for clean lines.

daleraquafinehpa3.name: Daler Rowney Aquafine HP A3
daleraquafinehpa3.description: A3 (297 × 420 mm) hot-pressed watercolour; cellulose, sized
daleraquafinehpa3.notes: Great for mixed media; slight suction from the watercolor sizing. Micron: tiny softening on very long strokes. Acrylic: absorbs a touch more and dries flatter, matte.

vangoghblacka3.name: Van Gogh Black Watercolour A3
vangoghblacka3.notes: High contrast background with softer micro-lines. Micron: can appear grey unless archival black and loses a little bite. Acrylic: neon/opaque colours pop and stay bold.

hahnemuhleharmonyhp.name: Hahnemühle Harmony Hot-Pressed 30.5×40.6cm
hahnemuhleharmonyhp.notes: Slight warm tone with even behaviour. Micron: crisp, just slightly softer than premium bristol. Acrylic: smooth application, mild absorption—ideal for line + acrylic accents.

strathmorebristolvellum.name: Strathmore Bristol Vellum 2-ply 27.9×43.2cm
strathmorebristolvellum.notes: Outstanding technical plotting sheet. Micron: the cleanest, sharpest line quality. Acrylic: sits on the surface, dries bright with almost no spread—top choice when precision matters.

hahnemuhleskizze190.name: Hahnemühle Skizze 190
hahnemuhleskizze190.description: A3 (297 × 420 mm) smooth sketch paper; cellulose
hahnemuhleskizze190.notes: Great for tests and drafts; slight tooth gives texture. Micron: perfectly usable with subtle texture. Acrylic: keep coverage light to avoid buckle.

cassartbristola3.name: Cass Art Bristol A3
cassartbristola3.description: A3 (297 × 420 mm) smooth bristol; cellulose, acid-free
cassartbristola3.notes: Clean, crisp lines; lighter than premium bristol. Micron: nearly Strathmore-level sharpness. Acrylic: fine for light-to-medium coverage. Great workhorse option.

ampersandgessobord.name: Ampersand Gessobord 11×14
ampersandgessobord.notes: Archival hardboard panel with gesso finish. Micron: behaves like a slick vellum and stays crisp. Acrylic and paint markers excel—ink sits on the surface and dries slower but flawlessly. Premium option for mixed media.
